text: dehaati log kehte hai ke hum imaan laaye, aap keh dijiye ke dar haqiqath tum imaan nahi laaye, lekin yo kaho ke hum Islaam laaye (muqaalifath chohd kar muthi ho gaye) halaan ke abhi tak tumhaare dilo mein imaan daakhil hee nahi hoa, tum agar Allah ki aur us ke rasool(sallallahu alaihiwasallam) ki farma bardaari karne lagoge to Allah tumhaare amaal mein se kuch bhi kam na karega, beshak Allah baqshne waala meherbaan hai
